How Can You Subscribe To My Blog?

Date: Mar 31, 2019

SUBSCRIBE

This site syndicates content via RSS (Really Simple Syndication) â€” which is an XML-based format for sharing and distributing Web content. Using an RSS reader, you can view data feeds from various news sources and blog sites in a central location.

How So I Sign Up For RSS Feeds? What is an RSS Reader?

To subscribe to RSS feeds, you need an RSS Reader (or Feed/News Aggregator). These programs (and services) will download and display RSS feeds for you. A number of free and commercial News Aggregators are available for download. Personally, I use Feedly. If you'd like to setup an RSS feed for your own jekyll-based github page, read this post.

What Are The RSS Feed(s) For This Site?
